misc: Waters the course more than the course sprinklers.
biography: Pekka, a formidable presence hailing from Espoo Ringside Golf, is set to make his seventh appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025. Known for his meticulous approach to the game and an almost obsessive dedication to course maintenance, rumor has it that Pekka waters the course more than the course sprinklers.

With one Hector Trophée victory under his belt, Pekka is always a threat to be reckoned with. While the coveted Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his consistent performance and strategic prowess make him a formidable competitor in both individual and pair formats.

Those who have the privilege of sharing the course with Pekka will attest to his unwavering commitment to the sport and a deep respect for its traditions. His presence is a testament to the spirit of the game, and his pursuit of excellence promises an exciting journey for both himself and his fellow competitors.
